title: 86/332/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 June 1986 approving a programme relating to the packing and marketing of potatoes in France pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 June 1986
approving a programme relating to the packing and marketing of potatoes in France pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the French text is authentic)
(86/332/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme relating to the packing and marketing of potatoes forwarded by the French Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 6 November 1985 concerning which supplementary information was submitted on 8 April 1986 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 June 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 372, 31. 12. 1985, p. 1.
